location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The tomb of Ezra, on the Tigris.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:144 x 192 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘49’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView from on board a vessel of the Tomb of Ezra, on the western shores of the Tigris. With palm trees in the background.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'The tomb of Ezra, on the Tigris.'Pencil, above image, at right: ‘49’;’27’
